author: Thomas
content:
Whatever the technicalities, that photo is really, really speedy! The somewhat empty parts in the foreground really convey that feeling to me. Weird, I always thought that empty, nearly uniform parts don't do that. Maybe it's the combination with the blurred light and the backlights of the car.

BTW, did blogger change something with the way comments are handled, or was that you? I don't seem to be able to put in my name/home-url any more...?
